name: HeyGia by Mezubo
description: HeyGIAâ€™s AI Digital Sales Promoter is a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution designed to help companies grow their sales with artificial intelligence. The core functionality of the AI Digital Promoter is to automatically originate conversations with customers/leads to educate them on products/services, advance them in the sales process, and ultimately identify purchase intent through real-time conversation to help companies increase their sales. The AI Digital Promoter communicates with customers through digital chat platforms like WhatsApp or any other, using natural language.
